info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 9 at 10:53AM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Memphis TN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Arkansas...
St Francis River Diversion Ditch at Madison
For the Saint Francis River...including Madison...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...St Francis River Diversion Ditch at Madison.
* WHEN...From Friday evening until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 35.0 feet, Homes and numerous secondary roads are threatened.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 AM CDT Wednesday the stage was 28.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Friday evening and continue rising to 35.4 feet Monday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 32.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
